SELECT coordinates_id, ride_id, latitude, longtitude, height, time FROM coordinates WHERE coordinates_id = #{coordinatesId}
SELECT coordinates_id, ride_id, latitude, longtitude, height, time FROM coordinates WHERE ride_id = #{rideId}
